SEARCH
Package gw.api.inboundfile

Class BaseInboundFileLineHandler

java.lang.Object
gw.api.inboundfile.BaseInboundFileLineHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
InboundFileLineHandler
public abstract class BaseInboundFileLineHandler extends Object implements InboundFileLineHandler
Base InboundFileHandler implementation providing certain default behavior for Inbound File handling. Implementer note -- Subclasses must implement InboundFileLineHandler.process(InboundRecord, gw.pl.persistence.core.Bundle, IntentionalLogger, Marker).

      public boolean shouldIgnore(String line, int lineNumber)
      Check to see if a line from the file should be ignored, such as a header, footer, or comment line.
      Specified by:
      shouldIgnore in interface InboundFileLineHandler
      Parameters:
      line - the raw line as read from the file.
      lineNumber - the line number of the line (starts with one).
      Returns:
      true if this line should be ignored, false if not.

    • calculatePurgeDate

      public Date calculatePurgeDate()
      Description copied from interface: InboundFileLineHandler
      This will set the purge date. Implementer note -- this method is using the InboundFileConfig.getDaysTillPurge(), so normally you don't want to change this. However, you might want to set the purge date based on status as well.
      Specified by:
      calculatePurgeDate in interface InboundFileLineHandler
      Returns:
      the date to set as purge date
